info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 23 at 12:47PM MDT until June 23 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
FFWABQ
The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... The Salt burn scar in... Southeastern Lincoln County in central New Mexico...
* Until 345 PM MDT.
* At 1247 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Salt Burn Scar. Between 0.25 and 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
Excessive rainfall over the burn scar will impact the Rio Ruidoso to the Rio Hondo as well as Highway 70. The debris flow can consist of rock, mud, vegetation and other loose materials.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Salt Burn Scar.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Salt Burn Scar.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ruidoso, Ruidoso Downs, Glencoe, San Patricio, Hondo, Tinnie and Hollywood.
This includes Highway 380 near Mile Marker 107.
info.instruction:
This is a life threatening situation. Heavy rainfall will cause extensive and severe flash flooding of creeks, streams and ditches in the Salt Burn Scar. Severe debris flows can also be anticipated across roads. Roads and driveways may be washed away in places. If you encounter flood waters, climb to safety.
Runoff from rainfall will cause elevated water levels within vulnerable drainages in and downstream of the Salt fire burn area.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 3:45 PM MDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 3:45 PM MDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 3:45 PM MDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 3:45 PM MDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
